### TICFIRE Phase A - Request for Information - Round 2

**Bid Solicitation Number:** WS3873891602
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Publication Date:** February 28, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** March 21, 2024 (2:00 pm EST)

**Project Overview:**
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC), on behalf of the Canadian Space Agency (CSA), is issuing a Request for Information (RFI) for Round 2 to seek detailed information and industry feedback regarding the detector for the Thin Ice Clouds and Far InfraRed Emissions (TICFIRE) instrument, which will be integrated on NASA's Atmosphere Observing System (AOS-SKY) spacecraft.

**Technical Details:**
The TICFIRE instrument is designed to measure ice clouds and far infrared emissions. PSPC is seeking detailed information and feedback from industry participants regarding the following:

* Detector design and development
* Technical requirements and specifications
* Manufacturing and testing processes

**Instructions for Submission:**
Respondents should follow the tender notice in SAP Ariba (https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18933310). Note that the original closing deadline has been revised to March 14, 2024 at 14:00 EST.

**Contact Information:**
For further information or to submit a response, please contact:

Laurie Kretzul (SPAC/PSPC)
